name: Free Ride
Lore: 'To prevent biker scouts from reaching their base, Luke and Leia ''borrowed'' some nearby transportation.',
Text: 'If you control a location where opponent has a speeder bike, AT-ST or skiff, steal that vehicle (any characters aboard are lost). OR Peek at one card randomly selected from opponent''s hand. If that card is a speeder bike, AT-ST or skiff, steal it into hand.',
